title: Xscape Women's Long Off Shoulder Sweetheart Neck Side Ruffle Gown (Reg and Petite)
description: Model is wearing a size 4 dress. Size 4 measures approximately 62" from shoulder to hem.
Fits true to size for a perfect, comfortable fit.
Features built-in bra cups for added support and convenience.
This dress is fitted at the waist and hips. The fabric has some stretch.
The off-the-shoulder neckline and flowing ruffle detail make this dress a romantic choice for formal events.

Upgrade your style with an off-the-shoulder scuba crepe dress, featuring a folded top, ruffle detail, and hidden back zipper. Fully lined for comfort, this elegant design is perfect for any special occasion.
